titles.title: For the relief of Germalyn Selga Salto and Carl Gino Selga Salto.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/20/2002--Introduced. Considers Germalyn Selga Salto and Carl Gino Selga Salto to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
